title: Audit Test Skip Markers
body:
Several test files use `@pytest.mark.skip` with reasons referencing tickets or dates. Audit all skip markers and either fix the underlying issue, document why the skip is permanent, or create tracking issues.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All `@pytest.mark.skip` markers audited
- [ ] Stale skips (>6 months) resolved or documented
- [ ] New skips require issue reference
- [ ] CI warns on skip count increase

title: Consolidate TypeScript SDK Packages
body:
Currently two TypeScript packages exist: `@aragora/sdk` and `@aragora/client`. Clarify purposes and ensure version parity.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Update README in both packages explaining differences
- [ ] Ensure version parity (both at 2.1.14)
- [ ] Cross-reference in documentation

title: Python Package Naming Consistency
body:
Clarify Python package naming: PyPI name `aragora`, module import `import aragora`.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Verify PyPI ownership
- [ ] Update pyproject.toml metadata
- [ ] Add package naming to CONTRIBUTING.md

title: Establish Integration Test Baseline
body:
Create baseline integration test suite that runs with minimal dependencies.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Integration tests run without API keys
- [ ] Mock providers for offline testing
- [ ] CI runs integration tests on every PR
- [ ] Test coverage report generated

title: Slack Integration - Production Ready
body:
Make Slack integration production-ready for SMEs with OAuth flow, slash commands, thread-based debates.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] OAuth installation flow works
- [ ] `/aragora debate` starts debate
- [ ] Responses appear in thread
- [ ] Final decision posted with receipt link
- [ ] Rate limiting respects Slack API limits

title: Microsoft Teams Integration
body:
Add Microsoft Teams connector with Azure AD app registration, Bot Framework integration, Adaptive Cards.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Teams app manifest created
- [ ] Bot responds to mentions
- [ ] Debates run in channel threads
- [ ] Decision receipts as Adaptive Cards

title: Decision Receipts v1
body:
Implement cryptographically-signed decision receipts with SHA-256 hash, timestamps, participant list, PDF/JSON export.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Receipt generated after each debate
- [ ] Unique receipt ID (UUID)
- [ ] Cryptographic signature (HMAC-SHA256)
- [ ] PDF and JSON export endpoints
- [ ] Receipt verification endpoint

title: Receipt Storage Adapter
body:
Create Knowledge Mound adapter for storing decision receipts with immutable storage and efficient retrieval.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] ReceiptAdapter implements KM interface
- [ ] Query by date range, topic, participant
- [ ] Export all receipts for compliance

title: OpenAPI 3.1 Specification
body:
Generate comprehensive OpenAPI 3.1 spec covering all 275+ endpoints with schemas, examples, error responses.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All endpoints documented
- [ ] Schemas match actual API responses
- [ ] Examples for every endpoint
- [ ] Auto-generation from code

title: TypeScript SDK Feature Parity
body:
Ensure @aragora/sdk has feature parity with Python SDK: all endpoints, WebSocket, types, error handling.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] SDK methods for all major endpoints
- [ ] WebSocket client for real-time events
- [ ] Types auto-generated from OpenAPI
- [ ] npm package published

title: SDK Code Generation Pipeline
body:
Create automated pipeline to generate SDK clients from OpenAPI for TypeScript, Python, and optionally Go.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `npm run generate:types` works
- [ ] Types match API exactly
- [ ] CI validates types are current

title: Interactive API Explorer
body:
Deploy Swagger UI or Redoc for interactive API exploration at docs.aragora.ai/api.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] API explorer deployed
- [ ] Works with API key auth
- [ ] Code samples for curl, Python, TypeScript, Go

title: Docker Compose Production Stack
body:
Create production-ready docker-compose.yml for SME deployment with PostgreSQL, Redis, Nginx, auto HTTPS.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `docker compose up` starts all services
- [ ] Data persisted in volumes
- [ ] Health checks for all services
- [ ] Works on 4GB RAM minimum

title: Guided Setup CLI
body:
Create interactive setup wizard: collects API keys, configures integrations, tests connectivity, generates .env.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `aragora setup` launches wizard
- [ ] Prompts for required API keys
- [ ] Connectivity tests
- [ ] Generates valid .env

title: Minimal Dependency Mode
body:
Allow Aragora to run with SQLite instead of PostgreSQL, in-memory cache instead of Redis.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `ARAGORA_MODE=minimal` uses SQLite
- [ ] No Redis required in minimal mode
- [ ] Clear upgrade path to full mode

title: Backup & Restore CLI
body:
Simple backup and restore commands for self-hosted: full database backup, KM export, one-command restore.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `aragora backup create` generates backup
- [ ] `aragora backup restore <file>` restores
- [ ] Backups are encrypted
- [ ] S3/GCS upload option

title: Budget Controls
body:
Implement budget controls: monthly/weekly limits, per-workspace budgets, hard/soft limits, email alerts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Budget settings in workspace config
- [ ] Real-time spend tracking
- [ ] Soft limit at 80%, hard limit at 100%
- [ ] Email notifications

title: Cost Tracking Per Debate
body:
Track token usage per agent, calculate cost per provider, display in receipts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Token counts tracked per API call
- [ ] Cost calculated from provider pricing
- [ ] Cost included in debate result and receipt

title: Usage Dashboard
body:
Dashboard showing debates this period, token usage, cost breakdown, budget status, top topics.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Dashboard page in live app
- [ ] Real-time data updates
- [ ] Filter by date range
- [ ] Export as CSV

title: Provider Cost Configuration
body:
Make provider costs configurable with defaults and custom override for negotiated rates.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Default costs for all providers
- [ ] Custom cost override per workspace
- [ ] Cost history preserved

title: Example App: Slack Code Review Bot
body:
Complete example showing Slack bot for code review debates with GitHub PR webhook trigger.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Full working example in examples/
- [ ] README with setup instructions
- [ ] Architecture diagram
- [ ] Deployable to Heroku/Railway

title: Example App: Document Analysis
body:
Example showing document upload, multi-agent analysis, summary generation.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Working document upload
- [ ] Analysis debate runs
- [ ] Results displayed nicely
- [ ] Export as report

title: Getting Started Tutorial
body:
Comprehensive guide: account setup, first debate (5 min), Slack integration (10 min), custom agents (15 min).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Step-by-step with screenshots
- [ ] Copy-paste code snippets
- [ ] Available at docs.aragora.ai

title: SDK Quickstart Guides
body:
Quickstart guides for Python, TypeScript, and REST API - each under 5 minutes.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Python quickstart < 5 minutes
- [ ] TypeScript quickstart < 5 minutes
- [ ] Each with working code

title: E2E Test Suite
body:
Comprehensive E2E tests: user signup, Slack flow, receipt generation, self-hosted deployment.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] E2E tests pass in CI
- [ ] Coverage of critical paths
- [ ] < 10 minute test runtime

title: Performance Benchmarks
body:
Establish baselines: debate start time, time to first token, receipt generation, API response times.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Benchmark suite created
- [ ] Baselines documented
- [ ] CI tracks regressions

title: Security Audit
body:
Security review: receipt signing, budget control bypass, webhook security, self-hosted defaults.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] No critical vulnerabilities
- [ ] OWASP top 10 addressed
- [ ] Penetration test passed

title: Load Testing
body:
Load test: 100 concurrent debates, 1000 API requests, WebSocket limits, connection pooling.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Load test scripts created
- [ ] Targets met
- [ ] Scaling recommendations

title: Release Notes v2.2.0
body:
Feature highlights, migration guide, breaking changes, known issues.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All features documented
- [ ] Migration guide complete
- [ ] Changelog updated

title: Landing Page Updates
body:
Update aragora.ai: SME pricing tier, self-hosted option, integration logos, testimonials.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Pricing page updated
- [ ] Self-hosted section added
- [ ] Performance < 3s load

title: Launch Checklist
body:
Pre-launch checklist: tests passing, docs complete, security audit passed, support ready, rollback plan.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All items checked
- [ ] Documented in LAUNCH_CHECKLIST.md

title: Post-Launch Monitoring
body:
Error rate dashboards, user tracking, feature adoption, support volume.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Dashboards created
- [ ] Alerts configured
- [ ] On-call rotation set

title: Helm Chart for Kubernetes
body: Deploy Aragora on Kubernetes clusters with Helm chart.

title: CLI for Power Users
body: Full-featured CLI: aragora debate, aragora receipts list, etc.

title: GitHub App
body: Native GitHub App for code review debates on PRs.

title: Mobile App (React Native)
body: iOS/Android app for monitoring debates.
